(NSMenu *) + menuWithAllActionsWithHierarchicalHost:

Detailed Description

An NSMenu helper which can add contextual menu items for a Stark context, or return an entire prefabricated menu containing all avalailable items.

Items in menus built using the methods of this class are disabled as needed when they are created, by setting a target, and by setting their action to NULL.  Do not implement -validateMenuItem: or -validateUserInterfaceItem for these menu items.

Most of the methods take, as arguments, the array of starks which would be involved if the menu command is clicked.  For convenience, these arrays are passed through to the action methods when a menu item is clicked as the -representedObject.  (The menu item is the 'sender' parameter passed to the action method, so that the action method may recover the array by sending [sender representedObject])
